languages.text: Феодальные миры — это отсталые, деградировавшие за тысячелетия осколки цивилизации, что долгое время были оторваны от лона Империума. Как правило, их технологии крайне примитивны, а вера в Бога-Императора облачена в причудливые формы.

traits.locale_text: Феодальные миры — это отсталые, деградировавшие за тысячелетия осколки цивилизации, что долгое время были оторваны от лона Империума. Как правило, их технологии крайне примитивны, а вера в Бога-Императора облачена в причудливые формы.

languages.text: Little more than shards of civilisation that have been separated from the Imperium's fold for thousands of years, feudal worlds tend to be underdeveloped and degraded. Their technology is usually primitive, and their faith in the God-Emperor often takes on bizarre forms.
languages.original_text: Феодальные миры — это отсталые, деградировавшие за тысячелетия осколки цивилизации, что долгое время были оторваны от лона Империума. Как правило, их технологии крайне примитивны, а вера в Бога-Императора облачена в причудливые формы.

traits.locale_text: Feudal worlds are underdeveloped and degraded over thousands of years shards of civilisation that have long remained separated from the Imperium's fold. Their technology is usually primitive, and their faith in the God-Emperor takes on bizarre forms.

The outcome of shards of civilisation that have been separated from the Imperium's fold for thousands of years, feudal worlds tend to be underdeveloped and degraded. Their technology is usually primitive, and their faith in the God-Emperor often takes on bizarre forms.

Little more than shards of civilisation that have been separated from the Imperium's fold for thousands of years, feudal worlds tend to be underdeveloped and degraded. Their technology is usually primitive, and their faith in the God-Emperor often takes on bizarre forms.

languages.text: Binlerce yıldır İmparatorluk'tan ayrı kalmış medeniyet parçalarından daha fazlası olan feodal dünyalar, az gelişmiş ve bozulmuş olma eğilimi gösterir. Teknolojileri genellikle ilkel olup Tanrı İmparator'a olan inançları da tuhaf biçimler alır.
languages.original_text: Little more than shards of civilisation that have been separated from the Imperium's fold for thousands of years, feudal worlds tend to be underdeveloped and degraded. Their technology is usually primitive, and their faith in the God-Emperor often takes on bizarre forms.

traits.locale_text: Binlerce yıldır İmparatorluk'tan ayrı kalmış medeniyet parçalarından daha fazlası olan feodal dünyalar, az gelişmiş ve bozulmuş olma eğilimi gösterir. Teknolojileri genellikle ilkel olup Tanrı İmparator'a olan inançları da tuhaf biçimler alır.

languages.text: 帝国の支配から何千年も切り離されたままの、文明の名残に過ぎない封建惑星は、概して発展が遅れ、荒廃している。技術はたいてい原始的であり、神帝陛下への信仰も奇異な形をとることが多い。
languages.original_text: Little more than shards of civilisation that have been separated from the Imperium's fold for thousands of years, feudal worlds tend to be underdeveloped and degraded. Their technology is usually primitive, and their faith in the God-Emperor often takes on bizarre forms.

traits.locale_text: 帝国の支配から何千年も切り離されたままの、文明の名残に過ぎない封建惑星は、概して発展が遅れ、荒廃している。技術はたいてい原始的であり、神帝陛下への信仰も奇異な形をとることが多い。

languages.text: Kaum mehr als Fragmente der Zivilisation, die dem Schoß des Imperiums in Tausenden von Jahren entrissen wurden, sind Feudalwelten nicht selten unterentwickelt und degradiert. Ihre Technologie ist für gewöhnlich primitiv und ihr Glaube an den Gottimperator nimmt oft bizarre Formen an.
languages.original_text: Little more than shards of civilisation that have been separated from the Imperium's fold for thousands of years, feudal worlds tend to be underdeveloped and degraded. Their technology is usually primitive, and their faith in the God-Emperor often takes on bizarre forms.

traits.locale_text: Kaum mehr als Fragmente der Zivilisation, die dem Schoß des Imperiums in Tausenden von Jahren entrissen wurden, sind Feudalwelten nicht selten unterentwickelt und degradiert. Ihre Technologie ist für gewöhnlich primitiv und ihr Glaube an den Gottimperator nimmt oft bizarre Formen an.

languages.text: Des fragments de civilisation n'ont pas eu la chance de bénéficier de l'influence de l'Imperium durant plusieurs millénaires. Ces mondes féodaux ont tendance à être sous-développés et dégradés. Leurs technologies sont généralement primitives et leur foi en l'Empereur-Dieu se matérialise souvent de manière inattendue.
languages.original_text: Little more than shards of civilisation that have been separated from the Imperium's fold for thousands of years, feudal worlds tend to be underdeveloped and degraded. Their technology is usually primitive, and their faith in the God-Emperor often takes on bizarre forms.

traits.locale_text: Des fragments de civilisation n'ont pas eu la chance de bénéficier de l'influence de l'Imperium durant plusieurs millénaires. Ces mondes féodaux ont tendance à être sous-développés et dégradés. Leurs technologies sont généralement primitives et leur foi en l'Empereur-Dieu se matérialise souvent de manière inattendue.

languages.text: Los mundos feudales, fragmentos de civilización apartados del Imperium durante miles de años, tienden a estar subdesarrollados y en condiciones lamentables. Su tecnología suele ser primitiva y su fe en el Dios Emperador puede tomar formas extrañas.
languages.original_text: Little more than shards of civilisation that have been separated from the Imperium's fold for thousands of years, feudal worlds tend to be underdeveloped and degraded. Their technology is usually primitive, and their faith in the God-Emperor often takes on bizarre forms.

traits.locale_text: Los mundos feudales, fragmentos de civilización apartados del Imperium durante miles de años, tienden a estar subdesarrollados y en condiciones lamentables. Su tecnología suele ser primitiva y su fe en el Dios Emperador puede tomar formas extrañas.

languages.text: 封建世界不过是文明的残片。这些世界与帝国文明隔绝数千年，大多处于落后、衰败的状态。它们的技术水平通常较为原始，对神皇的信仰也往往以怪异的形式呈现。
languages.original_text: Little more than shards of civilisation that have been separated from the Imperium's fold for thousands of years, feudal worlds tend to be underdeveloped and degraded. Their technology is usually primitive, and their faith in the God-Emperor often takes on bizarre forms.

traits.locale_text: 封建世界不过是文明的残片。这些世界与帝国文明隔绝数千年，大多处于落后、衰败的状态。它们的技术水平通常较为原始，对神皇的信仰也往往以怪异的形式呈现。
